entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Rigolet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow before morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near midnight then northwest 60 gusting to 80 before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
